publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-235 Dennis Canavan: A Fair Deal for NHS Workers—That the Parliament recognises the valuable job done by all those who work in the National Health Service; deplores the low level of pay which many of those workers receive; welcomes the Unison lobby of the Scottish Parliament to highlight such injustices, and supports the campaign to ensure a fairer deal for all NHS workers. Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Donald Gorrie*, Michael Matheson*

S1M-235 Dennis Canavan: A Fair Deal for NHS Workers—That the Parliament recognises the valuable job done by all those who work in the National Health Service; deplores the low level of pay which many of those workers receive; welcomes the Unison lobby of the Scottish Parliament to highlight such injustices, and supports the campaign to ensure a fairer deal for all NHS workers. Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Donald Gorrie, Michael Matheson, Kay Ullrich*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Alex Neil*
S1M-235 A Fair Deal for NHS Workers (lodged on 28 October 1999) Linda Fabiani*, Brian Adam*
S1M-235 A Fair Deal for NHS Workers (lodged on 28 October 1999) Dr Winnie Ewing*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-235 A Fair Deal for NHS Workers (lodged on 28 October 1999) Tommy Sheridan*, Fiona Hyslop*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr John McAllion*

S1M-235 Dennis Canavan: A Fair Deal for NHS Workers—That the Parliament recognises the valuable job done by all those who work in the National Health Service; deplores the low level of pay which many of those workers receive; welcomes the Unison lobby of the Scottish Parliament to highlight such injustices, and supports the campaign to ensure a fairer deal for all NHS workers. Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Donald Gorrie, Michael Matheson, Kay Ullrich, Mr Adam Ingram, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Alex Neil, Linda Fabiani, Brian Adam, Dr Winnie Ewing, Irene McGugan, Tommy Sheridan, Fiona Hyslop, Ms Sandra White, Mr John McAllion, Dennis Canavan*
S1M-235 A Fair Deal for NHS Workers (lodged on 28 October 1999) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-235 A Fair Deal for NHS Workers (lodged on 28 October 1999) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-235 A Fair Deal for NHS Workers (lodged on 28 October 1999) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Euan Robson*

S1M-235 Dennis Canavan: A Fair Deal for NHS Workers-That the Parliament recognises the valuable job done by all those who work in the National Health Service; deplores the low level of pay which many of those workers receive; welcomes the Unison lobby of the Scottish Parliament to highlight such injustices, and supports the campaign to ensure a fairer deal for all NHS workers. Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Donald Gorrie, Michael Matheson, Kay Ullrich, Mr Adam Ingram, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Alex Neil, Linda Fabiani, Brian Adam, Dr Winnie Ewing, Irene McGugan, Tommy Sheridan, Fiona Hyslop, Ms Sandra White, Mr John McAllion, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Euan Robson
S1M-235 A Fair Deal for NHS Workers (lodged on 28 October 1999) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-235 A Fair Deal for NHS Workers (lodged on 28 October 1999) Robert Brown*

S1M-235 Dennis Canavan: A Fair Deal for NHS Workers—That the Parliament recognises the valuable job done by all those who work in the National Health Service; deplores the low level of pay which many of those workers receive; welcomes the Unison lobby of the Scottish Parliament to highlight such injustices, and supports the campaign to ensure a fairer deal for all NHS workers. Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Donald Gorrie, Michael Matheson, Kay Ullrich, Mr Adam Ingram, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Alex Neil, Linda Fabiani, Brian Adam, Dr Winnie Ewing, Irene McGugan, Tommy Sheridan, Fiona Hyslop, Ms Sandra White, Mr John McAllion, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Euan Robson, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown
S1M-235 A Fair Deal for NHS Workers (lodged on 28 October 1999) Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-235 Dennis Canavan: A Fair Deal for NHS Workers—That the Parliament recognises the valuable job done by all those who work in the National Health Service; deplores the low level of pay which many of those workers receive; welcomes the Unison lobby of the Scottish Parliament to highlight such injustices, and supports the campaign to ensure a fairer deal for all NHS workers. Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan, Donald Gorrie, Michael Matheson, Kay Ullrich, Mr Adam Ingram, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Alex Neil, Linda Fabiani, Brian Adam, Dr Winnie Ewing, Irene McGugan, Tommy Sheridan, Fiona Hyslop, Ms Sandra White, Mr John McAllion, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Euan Robson, Nora Radcliffe, Robert Brown, Mr Kenny MacAskill
